result.execSummary:
Christopher Alan Siemers was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Christopher Alan Siemers was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Christopher Alan Siemers

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant, Christopher Alan Siemers, in custody, appeared with Attorney Donna Burger (by phone).  Prosecuting attorney Andrew John Maki.  Defendant in custody.  Kim Silvius - Clerk
(11:15)  MULTIPLE CASES HEARD.
State - two extradition matters - gave the deft waiver forms
Deft - no objection to attorney appearing by phone - agrees to extraditions and signs both documents in court

COURT:  reads extradition orders to deft - approves extraditions on both matters
bonds vacated once picked up

Defendant, Christopher A Siemers, in custody, appeared with Attorney Donna Burger.  Prosecuting attorney Aaron Olson.  Defendant in custody.  Kim Silvius - Clerk
(11:44)  MULTIPLE CASES HEARD.
State - have agreement in 14CF288 - plea to Ct 1 & 3 - joint recommendation Ct 1$468 6 months jail, Ct 3 $1539 cc (w/out dna chg) w/held sent  - 24 mo revo, IID, 60 days jail consec. all other counts dismissed, credit 140 days served - extradition files to remain on for Friday
Burger - that is correct
Deft 14CF288 - Ct 1 pleads no contest)  waives rights & JT
                           Ct 3 pleads no contest)  waives rights & JT
Deft addresses the court

COURT:  14CF288 Ct 1 & 3 pleas voluntary - finds deft guilty of both
Ct 1 - $468 cc ($268 + $200 dna )- CASH BOND APPLIES
          6 months jail - forthwith
Ct 3 - $1539 fine (includes blood draw) - CASH BOND APPLIES
          60 days jail - consecutive to Ct 1
          24 month revocation
          Assessment
          IID
          Credit 140 days jail served

14CF367 & 14CF287 - 2/6 at 10:45

DISMISS:  14tr6210, 14CF288 Ct 2 & 4

Defendant, Christopher Alan Siemers, in custody, appeared with Attorney Donna Burger.  Prosecuting attorney Aaron Olson.  Defendant in custody.  Kim Silvius - Clerk
(9:48)  MULTIPLE CASES HEARD.
Burger - no resolution - requests speedy trial on 14CF288

COURT:  bond continues - all other files tagalong
  Final pre-trial scheduled for February 6, 2015 at 10:45 am.  Jury trial scheduled for February 16, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant, Christopher Alan Siemers, in custody, appeared with Attorney Donna Burger.  Prosecuting attorney Andrew John Maki.  Defendant in custody.  Kim Silvius - Clerk

Burger - do not have criminal case resolved - need another pre-trial date - extradition matters to tagalong

COURT:  bonds continue - all files tagalong

  Final pre-trial scheduled for December 12, 2014 at 09:45 am.

Defendant, Christopher Alan Siemers, in custody, appeared with Attorney Donna Burger.  Prosecuting attorney Aaron Olson.  Defendant in custody.  Kim Silvius - Clerk

INFORMATION FILED
Burger - deft waives reading, pleads not guilty on 14cf288

COURT:  14CF287 tags along  Final pre-trial scheduled for November 11, 2014 at 02:30 pm.
